generated_body: The article titled "Senate confirms White House lawyer as appeals court judge" is likely to provide an overview of the recent confirmation of a lawyer from the White House to an appeals court position. Readers may expect to find details about the nomination process, including any relevant discussions or debates that occurred during Senate hearings.
